mapper.select: select count(invoice_entry_serial) from m_invoice_entry where creation_date = date('now', 'localtime') and m_invoice_entry.invoice_entry_serial like #{prefix}||'%'

select invoice_entry_serial, i.partner_company_id, c.full_name as company_full_name, invoice_type, invoice_number, total_amount, invoice_amount, invoice_indication, is_follow_up_indication, i.remark, drawer, creation_date, checkout_date, in_or_out, invoice_date, invoice_number_date, is_modified from m_invoice_entry as i join c_partner_company as c on i.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where invoice_entry_serial = #{serial}
mapper.update: update m_invoice_entry set invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber}, invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount}, partner_company_id = #{partnerCompanyID}, invoice_number_date = #{invoiceNumberDate}, remark = #{remark} where invoice_entry_serial =#{invoiceEntrySerial}
